description:
Non-material minor amendment of reserved matters planning permission ref: P081705 dated 06-Feb-2009 for the: ‘Reserved matters application pursuant to outline planning application P081704 detailing 'Appearance' and 'Landscaping' of Phase 2 of the Packington Estate redevelopment.  Phase 2 includes the erection of part 2 to part 6-storey buildings (some with basements) to provide for 142 dwellings comprising: 43 x 1; 57 x 2; 14 x 3; 16 x 4; 6 x 5 bedroom houses/maisonettes/flats; and 6 studio apartments together with D1 (community centre); A1(shop); D1(non-residential Institution); B1(temporary sales office) floorspace and landscaping works, new roads and on-street car parking.’  The amendments are: 
A]	amendment of conditions 2, 6, 8 and 9 to alter the timeframes for the submission of details; and
B]	the creation of a new condition (condition 13) listing the approved drawing numbers.
decision_conditions:
CONDTION (2):  Typical elevations of the buildings hereby approved at scale 1:50 shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to any superstructure works commencing on site.

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the elevations so approved, shall be maintained as such thereafter and no change therefrom shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON:  To ensure that the resulting building is of a high standard of design, appearance and sustainable construction and to comply with policies D1 and D4 of the Islington UDP 2002 and policy 4B.8 of the London Plan 2008.
